alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:22PM EST until January 07 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches, heaviest near the Cape Cod Canal. * WHERE...Barnstable MA County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour are possible Friday morning. The snow may briefly mix with rain on the outer Cape around Chatham to Wellfleet which will result in lower accumulations here.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
